Cluster Flow

A pipelining tool to automate and standardise bioinformatics analyses on cluster environments.

  • Introduction
  • Installation
  • Quick Start

Cluster Flow was written by Phil Ewels whilst working at the Babraham Institute, in Cambridge (UK). He now maintains it from SciLifeLab in Stockholm, Sweden.
